dmca.title: A Tip of the Red Hat
dmca.body:
As you may recall, we represent Red Hat, Inc. in intellectual property matters.  As you know, our client is the owner of rights for numerous trademarks, including its famous RED HAT mark and "Shadow Man" logo (collectively, the "RED HAT marks").  My former colleague, [Private], previously corresponded with you in connection with changes to be made to your web site to ensure compliance with our client's trademark guidelines.  We certainly appreciate your prompt attention and cooperation in the past, and the subsequent changes which were made, and hope that we can amicably discuss additional changes to your current web site.  

Our client is concerned with your company's use of RED TUX Linux to sell software with the "same source code and programs as Red Hat
dmca.recipient_name: Bside Internet Media, LLC d/b/a AlmostFreeLinux.com
